revision.text:
{{Infobox Berry |name = #19 Iapapa |image = [[File:Iapapa.png]] |caption = This Berry is very big and sour. The juiciness of the pulp accentuates sourness. |growtime = 6m 20s |harvest = 18 berries |replant = 30% |mutation = 0.5% |points = 60 |flavor =
*0 spicy *0 dry *0 sweet *0 bitter *15 sour }} '''Iapapa''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding an empty plot with at least 25, but no more than 80 points of sour and less than 5 points of all other flavours. The [[Aspear]] berry must be unlocked to obtain this berry. == Growth Tables == === Growth Stages === {| class="wikitable" | style = "image-rendering: pixelated" ! !! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 40 secs || 3 mins 20 secs || 3 mins 50 secs || 6 mins 20 secs - 12 mins 40 secs |- ! Animation |
[[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] ||
[[File:IapapaTreeTaller.png|50px]] ||
[[File:IapapaTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
[[File:IapapaTreeBerry.png|50px]] |} === Ripening Time with Modifiers === {| class="wikitable" | style="text-align: center;" ! Modifier !! Ripe-Wither Time |- ! None | 6 mins 20 secs -
12 mins 40 secs |- ! Sprayduck | 4 mins 13 secs -
8 mins 27 secs |} == Flow Chart == [[File:Iapapa_Flow_Chart.png|100px]]
== Mutation Strategy == === Possible Planting Formations === You can fill your farm in the following way to obtain Iapapa berries. Purple squares indicate where mutations can occur. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Base Formation |- | style="width: 40px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Aspear.png|30px]]
